Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the venom gland of the social wasp Vespa tropica.
Literature.Author: Yang X, Wang Y, Lee WH, Zhang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 10(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 37(MIC=5µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047(MIC=5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=40µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCCB 1010(MIC=10µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=80µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae(MIC=10µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=20µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=5µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=10µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli 37(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(no activity data)
